O

onAddAppointmentClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method is run on clicking the add Appointment button, and handles opening the proper version of the Appointment FXML.
onAddCustomerClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method is run on clicking the add customer button, and handles opening the proper version of the Customer FXML.
onByMonthClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method runs when clicking the by month button, and uses a lambda as a predicate to filter the table to only appointments this month.
onByWeekClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method uses a lambda as a predicate to filter the table to only show appointments that are in the ISO alligned week of this year.
OnCancelButtonClick() - Method in class Controllers.AppointmentController
This method runs when the Cancel button is pressed and provides a more stylish and user friendly way to close the window.
OnCancelButtonClick() - Method in class Controllers.CustomerController
This method runs on clicking the cancel button and is a more fancy way to close the window, cancel buttons are the future, embrace it.
OnCancelButtonClick() - Method in class Controllers.ScheduleReportingController
This method runs on clicking the cancel button, and closes the window just like if you used the close window button, but this is better.
OnContactComboClick() - Method in class Controllers.ScheduleReportingController
This method runs when a contact is selected, and fills the table according to the selection.
OnCountClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method runs when the Appointment Count button is clicked, and handles opening the CountReporting FXML.
OnCountrySelect() - Method in class Controllers.CustomerController
This method runs upon selecting a country and handles setting the Division Combo Box based on what Country was selected.
OnDefaultClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method resets the table to display all appointments.
OnDeleteAppointmentClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method runs when the delete Appointment button is clicked, and handles confirmation and deletion.
onDeleteCustomerClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method runs when the delete customer button is clicked, and handles confirmation and deletion.
OnScheduleClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method runs upon clicking the Schedule By Contact button and handles opening the ScheduleReporting FXML
onSignInButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controllers.SignInController
This method runs on clicking sign in and logs the attempt as either successful or failed as well as the time, and also validates the username and password, and if correct, opens the DBHome FXML.
OnSubmitButtonClick() - Method in class Controllers.AppointmentController
This method runs when the submit button is pressed and validates the input, as well as performs neccesary actions to confirm the addition or modification of an Appointment.
OnSubmitButtonClick() - Method in class Controllers.CustomerController
This method runs on clicking the Submit button, and handles field validation and running necessary methods to add or modify the Customer.
OnTotalsClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method runs when the Totals button is clicked and opens a popup window showing the number of customers and appointments.
OnUpdateAppointmentClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method is run on clicking the update Appointmetn button, and handles opening the proper version of the Appointment FXML.
onUpdateCustomerClick() - Method in class Controllers.DBHomeController
This method is run on clicking the update customer button, and handles opening the proper version of the Customer FXML.
openConnection() - Static method in class Classes.DBConnect
This method opens a connection with the database server.
overlapValidator(int, ZonedDateTime, ZonedDateTime, int) - Static method in class Classes.Appointment
This method validates that the Customer does not have any conflicting Appointments.
